body:
I'm so confused. i'm just getting back on now, and i see al these new features.
i gotta few questions.
actually just one.
1.How do you join a team? do u have to get invited, or what?
body_tagged:
I'm so confused. i'm just getting back on now, and i see al these new features.
i gotta few questions.
actually just one.
1.How do you join a team? do u have to get invited, or what?
title: Confused.

replies.body: You can get invited by the Team Leader of your team (if you are in a clan). That will appear in your notifications tab.
replies.body_tagged: You can get invited by the Team Leader of your team (if you are in a clan). That will appear in your notifications tab.
